评论详情: These shorts are so cute on. They have a little stretch but keep their shape when on. The shorts are made with a thick material and the bottom cuff ads detail to them. They can be dressed down or dressed up.
I love the stretch of these shorts.  The style is great, only complaint I have is the back of the shorts go down lower than the front and don’t feel like they hit where they should on my backside.
As long as you go by their size chart, you'll be good to go. Wonderful shorts that go with anything, easy slip on and slip off, and they git very comfortably.
I did not have much hope for shorts ordered off amazon but SO pleasantly surprised!!!  Am 0, they fit perfect!!

Looove these shorts! Stretchy and comfortable w/o looking sloppy. I've paired it with band shirts and dressier, flouncy tops and it literally goes with both. I ended up getting 2 pairs because they're THAT amazing. They do run a tad bit large so definitely size down. I'm usually a 28 but I bought the 27 for a tighter fit.
They are really cute but just not worth the money in any kind of way
Ive tried many Jean shorts and a couldn’t find any that were cute AND comfortable.  Most Jean shorts are uncomfortable in the inseam if you know what I mean.

The denim is of a good quality.  I felt the shorts were slightly big.  The sewn-in cuff did not wash well though.  The folds were never even again (I find this happens with any sewn-in cuffs).  So I decided to cut off the cuff and make them straight-up cut-off jean shorts.  Still cute!
As pictured

评论概述: Cute shorts that are figure flattering!
评论详情: These shorts are so cute and fit is exactly as size guideline indicates. I am 5’7, 117 lbs and the 24” waist is as of it was meant for my shape. Fabric is perfect with a little stretch and the length is perfect!  Would buy this brand again.

Super cute ... I personally don’t agree with other reviews mine look exactly as pictured . I do agree if you are in between sizes go a size down. They have a tiny bit of stretch.. not a ton. Just enough to be comfortable. Yet do not stretch out of shape too easily at all. Order these you will not be disappointed. Depending on The brand I wear a 24 or 25. Ordered both in this short not knowing. The 25 fit. I wear more and prefer my size 24. But won’t return the 25 as they fit just a tiny bit looser.

I love these!  They run a little loose intentionally so they're very comfortable while still looking structured and not baggy.  The length is great - not very short but also not "mom" length!  They're so soft and wear really well.
Love them! They are perfect everywhere from length to overall fit! Ordered another color too!
Was not the shorts pictured. Will be returning.

评论概述: Loose in the hips and thighs. Comfortable!
评论详情: Very comfortable boyfriend style short. Meant to be roomy. I did not size down and they are perfect.

评论概述: Super cute, boyfriend relaxed fit sizing
评论详情: Love the style and these are super comfortable. I ordered one size larger than my normal size because I wanted a looser fit, I am re-ordering in my normal size as these have a relaxed fit built into the sizing. I can see myself living in these on my upcoming vacation.
I was disappointed that the jeans didn't look as advertised. They only had one small distressed patch. I was also disappointed that I could not return/exchange them.

评论概述: What I liked the most about these shorts is that they were ...
评论详情: What I liked the most about these shorts is that they were the perfect length and you could dress them up or down. They run big and stretch so I would size down. The one BIG disappointment about these shorts is that they didn’t wash up well. I followed the tag directions exactly and they came out looking bad- almost like they were going to fall apart. For the money, I was REALLY disappointed.

评论概述: Cute, but I don’t want muffin top
评论详情: These are cute, but gave me a muffin top. I gave them to my daughter to try on, her body shape is totally different than mine, and she had the same problem. I returned them
Super cute, perfect lenth, just the right amount of distressing. True to size
These are great! I have slightly muscular thighs and these are not too tight, not too loose. Perfect amount of stretch.
Love them super comfy !
Cute but run big and stretch out

Perfect pair of shorts.  Nice length - not too short but short enough that they look cute and stylish.  They have a bit of stretch to them which adds to the comfort.  Can’t wait for warm weather to style them!

These shorts are very stretchy so you may want to size down or just wear them a little baggy. I really like them. Not too short. Really nice colour. I’m 5’7” 128 lbs...size 27 good...little loose around waist.
